name: git-backup-sync
description: Backup and sync your wip(work in progress) through git

commands.title: Git Backup & Sync: Create Backup Branch
Git Backup & Sync: Retire Backup Branch
Git Backup & Sync: Sync Backup Branch

git-backup-sync.defaultAutoBackupBranche.description: Unless overrided for specific branches, auto backup every branch

git-backup-sync.defaultBackupUpstreamNam.description: The upstream name we backup to. This defaults to "origin"

git-backup-sync.backupBranchNamePrefix.description: The prefix of backup branch name. This defaults to 'gbs-backup-'

git-backup-sync.branchInfo.enabled.description: Whether to enable the branch info file. Enabling this file allows for more granular customization per branch, at the cost of needing to manage an additional config file.

git-backup-sync.branchInfo.path.markdownDescription: **This only is effective when branchInfo file is enabled**. Path pointing to the Backup Branch Info file.

git-backup-sync.branchInfo.shouldCommitB.markdownDescription: **This only is effective when branchInfo file is enabled**. When creating a new Backup Branch, do you want to commit the branch info file change. (This is useful for sharing across devices)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
